title: Support Ticket
body: Do any mod know when support will help me with my ban appeal? I appealed on sunday thank you

replies.body: Toss me your ticket number, and I'll check on the status for you.  ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3URN3zvl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-10T17:19:19.512+0000)
>
> Toss me your ticket number, and I'll check on the status for you.  ^^

32088398

Hey thanks!  We're not able to assist with this on the boards, but a specialist can look at your specific case individually.  I've verified that your ticket was received and has been sent to the proper team!  Hang tight, and a specialist will reach out as soon as they can.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3URN3zvl,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-10T20:05:42.672+0000)
>
> Hey thanks!  We're not able to assist with this on the boards, but a specialist can look at your specific case individually.  I've verified that your ticket was received and has been sent to the proper team!  Hang tight, and a specialist will reach out as soon as they can.

Hey thank you for using your time but why can i access my support tickets? in the league support website it states that that page has not been found...
Make sure you're logged into your account on the ticketing center, and on the correct region on the top right.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3URN3zvl,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-10T20:10:09.019+0000)
>
> Make sure you're logged into your account on the ticketing center, and on the correct region on the top right.

I did.. it just brings me back to my account Fatty1014 on top right but when i check my tickets they are from another account.....
Was digging into this for you but I saw you were able to reply to your ticket.  Looks like it's okay now!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3URN3zvl,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-10T20:24:05.985+0000)
>
> Was digging into this for you but I saw you were able to reply to your ticket.  Looks like it's okay now!

Yup thank you... Can you be of a favor and read my appeal and replying here if you think i have a chance? Cause im sorry to everyone i made upset to but i really am going to reform and willing to change riot.... Do u think il have a 50% chance cause ive seen people get unbanned in youtube they posted it...

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3URN3zvl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-10T17:19:19.512+0000)
>
> Toss me your ticket number, and I'll check on the status for you.  ^^

Plz riot member if you can just understand how i feel about how stupid i was and give me one more chance. Im being 100% honest but i quit for 2-4 months thinking that my next ban will be 14 even tho i tried to prevent it when i started playing again and in the two months ive played i wasnt toxic and extremely happy about playing the game again. I understand my mistakes and im 100% willing to change and reform. I see now that pain is something i never want again and i will truly reform riot so if you can please tive me one more chance
